summary: Summon the mother of all raging chickens!
descriptionHtml:
[center]
Video amg!
[youtube]QLtU5wknQ2I[/youtube]


As usual discworld alpha trailer
[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube]

[/center]


Mod adds a new spell in the Winterhold arcanaeum
Spell summons a chicken who will fight with you and cast a myriad of spells
One of the spells will summon a second smaller baby raging chicken who casts random spells at your foes

That's really about it, pretty simple and to the point

The chicken will not hurt friendly's (Usually)
The chickens only become crazy when in combat
author: darren83
